item.title: Resume
item.description: Name E-mail Github Li. Mingzhi lmingzhi618@gmail.com https://github.com/mingzhi198 Education Background University Major Period Shenzhen University Software Engineering 2016.3~2019.1 Henan Institute of Technology Mechanical Manufacture and Automation 2005.9~2008.7 Special Skills Good at troubleshooting, analyzing and solving problems. Good at optimizing interface performance, achieving high concurrent access and stability. Professional Skills Familiar with Golang (2017 to present), C/C++, Python development under Linux Familiar with TCP/IP, HTTP network protocol Familiar with encryption algorithms (DES/AES/RSA/MD5/HASH) Familiar with GCC, GDB, Makefile, Blade, and other compilation and debugging tools, and proficient in Vim development Familiar with databases: MySQL, Redis, MongoDB, SQLite Familiar with message queues: RabbitMq.
